short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Avoid harmful chemicals in your products with this Ingredient Scanner. Curious Chloride helps you sort out clean beauty.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Curious Chloride chrome extension marks harmful chemicals, allergens and animal-derived ingredients on content lists, so you can avoid them easily.

Go to your favorite webshop, locate the ingredients, and scan the page. 

The result is instantly shown, with ingredients of concern getting brightly highlighted. 

Hover over the ingredients to know more and follow the links if you feel like getting nerdy. 

The scanner checks cosmetic products for harmful ingredients such as hormone disruptors, carcinogens, developmental and reproductive toxicants, bioaccumulative substances, and environmental hazards.
